entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
